title: Marketing Intern
aboutCompany: BrightStart Pvt. Ltd. is an innovative startup focused on providing cutting-edge tech solutions for small businesses. We specialize in software development, digital marketing, and data analytics.
aboutInternship:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in developing and implementing marketing campaigns
2. Manage social media accounts and create engaging content
3. Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities
4. Collaborate with the sales team to enhance lead generation
5. Analyze campaign performance and suggest improvements
Whocanapply:
Only those candidates can apply who:

1. are available for full time (in-office) internship
2. can start the internship between 1st Jan'24 and 1st Mar'24
3. are available for duration of 3 months
4. are from or open to relocate to Delhi
5. have relevant skills and interests
* Women wanting to start/restart their career can also apply.
AdditionalInfo:
Job offer: On successful conversion to a permanent employee, the candidate can expect a salary of Rs. 200000 to 400000 /year
Stipend structure: This is a performance-based internship. In addition to the minimum-assured stipend, you will also be paid a performance-linked incentive (5% of revenue generated).
